thread.title: Listen: What Would Metallica's 'Justice' Album Sound Like If Cliff Played On It [News]
thread.title_full: Listen: What Would Metallica's 'Justice' Album Sound Like If Cliff Played On It [News]

title: Listen: What Would Metallica's 'Justice' Album Sound Like If Cliff Played On It [News]
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 17 hours ago 0 
Bassist Andriy Vasylenko presented an interesting video, featuring his take on what would Metallica's " ...And Justice for All " album sound like if late great Cliff Burton played on it. 
The musician explained: "Of course you've thought about it - what if Cliff were still alive and recorded all the Metallica albums featured Jason Newsted. This topic often leads to a hot discussion that makes no sense, actually. Nevertheless, the question 'what if' could teach some interesting things in terms of music. 
"So, this is my speculative '...And Justice for All' bass medley, how it might sound with Cliff's bass arrangement approach, based on what I've learned making Total Cliff. Just take it easy and express your tolerant point in comments. R.I.P. Cliff \m/" 
You can check out the jam below.
